name: GitHub Release Stats
description: A clean, minimalist web app that provides simple release analytics for GitHub repositories. Visualize release patterns, download statistics, and version history at a glance.

name: SwiftDocs
description: A modern web interface for generating PDF documentation from OpenAPI/Swagger specifications with extensive customization options and multiple input methods.

name: Audio Metadata Viewer (AMV)
description: Web-based audio metadata parser supporting multiple formats and metadata standards. Features drag & drop, clipboard integration, and Katbin sharing.
